reviews.review:
To this date this is one of the most stunningly visual games I have played. 

Bioshock Infinite is a game that truly holds up to the test of time, everytime you come back to it it feels fresh, especially in moments such as your acension into Columbia whenever you start a new game. 

I absolutely love the story of this is game and always have enjoyed playing it. Though the game does have the occasional hiccup on windows when playing it I would still recommend anyone that is at all interested in this game to try it. You won't be dissapointed.
I'm just here for steam xp, but it is a fun game with characters to love.

A fun and interactive game with an interesting storyline and amazing gameplay. Great both for chilling out and having a laugh, or going for an intense gaming session. Thoroughly enjoyed - would recommend to anyone who enjoys FPSRPGs.

Eu não conheço nenhuma série de jogos que tenha uma história mais complexa e bem elaborada do que a série Bioshock, e sim eu a considero melhor que a série "The Last of Us" e a jogos de pesos semelhantes, eu não recomendo apenas o Bioshock Infinte, mas sim todos os jogos da série para pessoas que curtem jogos com um enredo muito acima da média e desenvolvido, com soundtracks incríveis e uma ambientação inesquecível 

Semelhante a IGN, UOL e Metacritic eu não poderia dar menos de 9 para esse jogo não é?

Welcome to the city of Columbia. Floating amongst the clouds, cruising far above sea level, this is a place unlike any you've ever seen. The third game in the popular Bioshock world breaks away from the underwater setting of the first two games to take players into a floating city held aloft by dirigibles. The game is set in 1912. You play as Booker DeWitt, a disgraced former private detective who's picked up a new case. Your goal is to find Elizabeth, a young woman who's gone missing and return her unharmed. The only problem is that she's being kept on this flying city. Columbia was once a symbol of America's success as a nation, floating around the world as a traveling World's Fair, a marvel of human innovation. But strange things have happened since Columbia's unveiling in 1900, and now the city has disappeared into the clouds. DeWitt knows how to find it, but over the years stories have been told about Columbia having unlawful heavy armament and deranged citizenry. Do not expect this to be a pleasure cruise.

Deep story that can make you cry. It's beatiful and sad and without spoilers I can't tell you how good it is. Good shooter and even better story teller, worth it to see it to the end.

[h1]Without equal[/h1]
I have actually started to write this review 5 times already and given up. 
I have done this because 5 times I was unable to find the words to say how good the game is, how real and legitimate the characters feel, how good the story is, how good it feels to play this game. My friend kept telling me to buy this for months, telling me how good it was, especially the story. 
In the end I believed him, but I never thought it would be this good. The story in Bioshock 1 was already really good, but this is in a complete different level. The only companion in the game was the best companion I've ever had in a game, she was always interested in the world, pointing at interesting spots, reacting to stuff. The dialogs don't feel empty and senseless, I felt like every one of them was worth my time.
Anyways, I think it's better to just say " just buy the damn thing". It's almost always on sale, but even if it's not, you can be sure its worth your money.
It's very good game
Very good story

Although the game proves the genius of Ken Levine again with its story, I do agree with TotalBiscuit about boring combat getting in the way of it.

Игра прошла проверку временем, хотя и нельзя сказать что она старая.
Могу сказать что и по сей день, игра во многом (сюжета, драммы, и неожиданных поворотов в частности) остается лучшей в жанре action, не уступая даже новому вульфику.
Astonishing.

神秘的女孩儿伊丽莎白很少离开你身边，而且不像这年头的大部分AI一样，她不需要你像个保姆似的看着她。恰恰相反，她会好好照顾你，不顾战火的喧嚣丢给你子弹和治疗，时不时还会朝你扔钱，甚至有时候会用她的次元传送能力帮你改变战场布局。在交火中，这种能力或许可以帮你轻易到达飞行的炮楼，掩体，重火力武器或者医药包。

       而伊丽莎白自己事实上是整个故事的中心角色，也是时时刻刻的中心。当她决定和我一起行动时，只要有一小会儿不在，我就会注意到。这不仅仅是一种游戏设定，更是当她不在身边的时候，我真的会打从心眼里感到怅然若失。

      至于那些被你开枪干掉的家伙们，有不少人都很滑稽。比如那个以乔治·华盛顿为原型创造的爱国者机器人，被哥伦比亚的总统当成神一样崇拜。还有那些吓人的10英尺高的原型机器人，第一次见的时候那帮家伙可是把我吓坏了，我还以为我只能逃跑呢，不过事实上我没跑。它们比看起来的要敏捷得多，至少它们的AI聪明到懂得藏在掩体和天际线里，好增加自己获胜的几率。

       该作并不是一款丑陋的游戏，事实上它挺美观的，但低质量的贴图、如同木头的NPC，以及偶尔出现的明显画面卡顿，严重地降低了游戏体验。似乎《无限》的野心过于膨胀，至少在技术方面，已经远远超出了老旧主机的硬件水平。PC版，哪怕只是运行在中端配置上，都不会在画质上有丝毫妥协。想象一下拥有高清贴图材质、细节充足的面部，以及流畅画面的《生化奇兵：无限》吧，这才是玩家真正需要的。

Sinceramente, um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei, tem uma trilha e história incrível, mesmo apresentando algumas falhas de roteiro. Apresenta provavelmente a maior "plot twist" em um jogo, inesperada, porém com dicas do que estava por acontecer. Mesmo não apresentando o conteúdo do trailer, continua sendo um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei. Realmente mais do que eu esperava.
